item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by William Shakespeare
Darius Cordell add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "See, the problem is that God gives men a brain and a penis, and only enough blood to run one at a time." -- Robin Williams

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "What are men to rocks and mountains?" -- Jane Austen

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Try to understand men. If you understand each other you will be kind to each other. Knowing a man well never leads to hate and almost always leads to love." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "Murderers are not monsters, they're men. And that's the most frightening thing about them." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by P.C. Cast
item.description: "Actually, since I'm gay I think I should count for two guys instead of just one. I mean, in me you get the male point of view and you don't have to worry about me wanting to touch your boobies." -- P.C. Cast

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Margaret Cho
item.description: "I was like, Am I gay? Am I straight? And I realized...I'm just slutty. Where's my parade?" -- Margaret Cho

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by steve martin
item.description: "I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy." -- steve martin

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Joan Rivers
item.description: "A man can sleep around, no questions asked, but if a woman makes nineteen or twenty mistakes she's a tramp." -- Joan Rivers

item.title: Darius Cordell add a quote by Barbara Bush
item.description: "Clinton lied. A man might forget where he parks or where he lives, but he never forgets oral sex, no matter how bad it is." -- Barbara Bush
